name: Carbon Constraint Initiatives
goal:
CCI's aim is to help national authorities, organisations in achieving GHG reduction and energy performance.

We offer our clients climate change, energy and sustainability related services. In order to serve our clients we have created a network of associated, highly experienced consultants offering expertise in different areas: the European Emission Trading Scheme, Kyoto Protocol based flexible mechanisms; JI/CDM, National GHG inventory set-up, verification of GHG inventories, voluntary carbon standard, GHG reporting, energy management, certification and CSR.

We have been involved in providing assistance to the Commission on the implementation of EU ETS, monitoring, reporting, verification and accreditation.
We have assisted the Commission in checking NIMS applications for free allocation.
